title: Mini-Ep 72: Relationship Roles
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 72: Relationship Roles

description:
oree and Kate receive a nostalgic email about the Singles building, hear from a listener about their lack of initiating hangouts, give recs for getting over a breakup, and advise someone wondering how to support their husband who recently came out as trans.


To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.


This episode is sponsored by:


  • Big Sky (CA) - You can purchase Big Sky from your favorite audiobook retailer or visit penguinrandomhouse.ca.
  • Buffy - For $20 off your Buffy comforter visit buffy.co and enter promo code FOREVER35. 
  • Pretty Litter - For $20 off your first order, visit prettylitter.com and enter promo code FOREVER35.
  • Daily Harvest - For $25 off your first box, visit daily-harvest.com and enter promo code FOREVER35.
  • ThirdLove - Get 15% off your first purchase when you go to thirdlove.com/forever.
  • Blinkist - To start your free 7-day trial, visit blinkist.com/forever.
  • FIGS - For 15% off your first purchase, visit wearfigs.com and enter promo code FOREVER35.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
